title: ATARI 2600
description: Made swapping cartrages the norm and made it playable from home.

title: NES
description: Saved the video game instrusty after a drop in game quality. Changed many of the game genres we play today.

title: GAME BOY
description: A console for handheld players, introducing characters such as Kirby and Dr. Mario.

title: SNES
description: Created a pseudo-3D effect for the console, also had stronger power than any of Nintendos previous consoles.

title: VIRTUAL BOY
description: A Nintendo product that had a very short lifespan, lasting a very limited amount of time. Uses 3D goggles for viewing.

title: PS1
description: Started with great 3D graphics that were new for the time. Had a very expansive library. Playstations first console.

title: XBOX
description: The most powerful release of the time, the XBOX was known for a large expansive library that ran as well as computers at the time.

title: GAMECUBE
description: Given somewhat of a kid-like reputation, this console was shaped like what some people described as a 'lunch-box'. It was, however, stronger than its competetor: the PS2

title: DS
description: Utillized two screens, one could be used for touch-screen, and made a stronger handheld that previously done.

title: PSP
description: Challenged Nintendos handhelds by creating a stronger portable system.

title: XBOX 360
description: Created great graphically strong graphics that were great for the time. Started the online gaming experience that we use all the time today.

title: WII
description: Though underpowered compared to current competetors, Nintendos Wii would eventaully become one of the most loved and remembered consoles of all time.

title: 3DS
description: Introduced glasses-free 3D gaming that was availible for handheld players.

title: PSVITA
description: Praised for its hardware, the Vita was known for its online capability, but did not find a large audience.

title: WII U
description: A sequel to the Wii, the console used a Gamepad for two-screen gameplay. Unfortunately, the console was made fun of and forgotten.

title: XBOX ONE
description: Attempted an all-in-one console with many features like voice-recognition and online gameplay like never before.

title: NINTENDO SWITCH
description: Created a revolutionary new design, making a smooth transition between handheld and docked play.

title: PS5
description: Using incredible speeds and graphics, the PS5 struggled to have enough for people to get their hands on one.
